verses.name: Mark 16:1
verses.text: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.

verses.name: Mark 16:2
verses.text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week, they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun.

verses.name: Mark 16:3
verses.text: And they said among themselves, Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre?

verses.name: Mark 16:4
verses.text: And when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away: for it was very great.
